// config/ecosystem.config.js
module.exports = {
  /**
   * Application configuration section
   * http://pm2.keymetrics.io/docs/usage/application-declaration/
   */
  apps: [
    // First application
    {
      name: "",
      script: "./bin/www",
      watch: true,
      ignore_watch: [
        // ä»ç›‘æ§ç›®å½•ä¸­æ’é™¤
        "node_modules",
        "logs",
        "public",
        ".idea",
        ".git",
      ],
      watch_options: {
        followSymlinks: false,
      },
      error_file: "./logs/pm2/app-err.log", // é”™è¯¯æ—¥å¿—è·¯å¾„
      out_file: "./logs/pm2/app-out.log", // æ™®é€šæ—¥å¿—è·¯å¾„
      instances: 2,
      // instance_var: "NODE_APP_INSTANCE",
      exec_mode: "cluster", // é›†ç¾¤æ¨¡å¼ è´Ÿè½½å‡è¡¡
      env: {
        COMMON_VARIABLE: "true",
      },
      env_production: {
        NODE_ENV: "production",
      },
      env_dev: {
        NODE_ENV: "dev",
      },
      env_test: {
        NODE_ENV: "test",
      },
    },
  ],
